plans.topic: LangGraph 深度研究代理最佳实践

plan.topic: LangGraph 深度研究代理最佳实践
plan.goal: 整理构建 LangGraph 多代理深度调研流程的可复用实践。
assumptions: 已配置 OpenRouter 与 Tavily API
risks: 文档版本更新导致示例过时

steps.title: 梳理官方 LangGraph 能力
steps.expected_outcome: 列出支持多代理协作的关键特性

steps.title: 分析社区最佳实践
steps.expected_outcome: 总结可复用的 Planner/Researcher 模式

steps.title: 汇总行动建议与缺口
steps.expected_outcome: 形成实施清单并标记需审阅事项

steps.title: 准备人工审阅检查表
steps.expected_outcome: 确认引用覆盖与风险记录

plans.topic: Edge AI rollout strategy for mid-size retail chains

plan.topic: Edge AI rollout strategy for mid-size retail chains
plan.goal: Outline a phased deployment roadmap for edge AI across 50+ retail stores.
assumptions: Edge inference hardware budget is approved

steps.title: Audit current retail data flows
steps.expected_outcome: Inventory existing sensors, integrations, and latency requirements

steps.title: Compare edge hardware/software stacks
steps.expected_outcome: Summarize 3 vendor options with cost, support, and deployment model

steps.title: Define phased rollout plan
steps.expected_outcome: Describe pilot, scale-out, and governance milestones

steps.title: Document risk mitigation actions
steps.expected_outcome: List operational, security, and compliance risks with fallback procedures

steps.title: Prepare executive review packet
steps.expected_outcome: Provide talking points and budget summary for leadership sign-off

plans.topic: Kubernetes cost optimization for multi-tenant SaaS

plan.topic: Kubernetes cost optimization for multi-tenant SaaS
plan.goal: Identify actionable levers to reduce infrastructure spend without impacting tenant isolation.
assumptions: Workloads run on managed Kubernetes in multiple regions
Observability stack is available for cost attribution

steps.title: Audit baseline resource consumption
steps.expected_outcome: Gather current spend by namespace and workload class

steps.title: Evaluate optimization levers
steps.expected_outcome: Summarize impact of autoscaling, bin packing, and spot node pools

steps.title: Draft phased optimization roadmap
steps.expected_outcome: Outline quick wins vs. longer-term platform changes

steps.title: Define monitoring and rollback guardrails
steps.expected_outcome: List KPIs, alert thresholds, and rollback criteria for stakeholder approval
